Articles.Content: I am looking for alternatives to the cart mod that I can use to land on the moon. When I add the cart to my current rocket that can easily get to the moon it causes my craft to start rolling and I was wondering if there are any alternates or solutions to the cart.

Thanks for the link. It looks like it could work and this solves another problem I was having with the cart

I have successfully flown the cart to the Mun by balancing it with two landing legs opposite it, this was without SAS or ASAS as well as I like to fly manually, the rear wheels made the other two landing points.

Getting back involved a Knight rider style ramp jump, much fun

If I\'m radially attaching the cart I put a novapunch ascent engine on it\'s belly and a fuel tank/line on the part of the stack that\'s riding the cart.

Actually, that\'s basically the same thing I do when stacking the cart too.

If you use a main descent stage under it, vernier pods or a gimbal enabled main engine will keep it upright more effectively than SAS alone.

You don\'t have to use mods to travel around on the Mun. Large Fuel tanks act as a good wheel when on their sides they can reach speeds of up to 3m/s. Use q & e to go forwards/backwards and w & s to turn.

Or you could use my jet pack parts and just fly around for ages and land quite easy.
